snippet.title: KAIJU WARS | Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Kaiju Wars is available NOW on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1508400/Kaiju_Wars/

Join the Discord | https://bit.ly/KaijuDiscord
Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/Foolish_M_Games

Advance Wars meets Into the Breach in this stylish 2D turn-based strategy game. Play out a Kaiju (big monster) movie as the (hopelessly) outclassed military. Construct buildings and defend your city with cannon-fodder tanks, jets, and more as the devastating kaiju grows in power with every attack!

http://www.foolish-mortals.net/kaijuwars
